thread.title: Return to Olympics Accommodation
thread.title_full: Return to Olympics Accommodation - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Clansman139
title: Return to Olympics Accommodation
text: First time back since staying here as an Athletics Technical Official during The Olympic Games in 2012. Accommodation still excellent and staff training a delight to experience. Food was again of the best quality and well presented by a friendly staff. Special mention for our dinner waitress Stroma who excelled with her wit and charm allied to courteous service. A great venue for the family business which we had in Ilford although the replacement rail bus service was a bit of a bind. Will certainly be back here before too long. Well done everybody you are an excellent advertisement for the tourist industry!
